thread.title: Even the Greater Manchester Police are now trolling Liverpool after shocking February form
thread.title_full: Even the Greater Manchester Police are now trolling Liverpool after shocking February form

author: Mark Jones
title: Even the Greater Manchester Police are now trolling Liverpool after shocking February form
text:
Sport Even the Greater Manchester Police are now trolling Liverpool after shocking February form The Reds shocking recent form coincided with an upturn in fortunes at Old Trafford, and it seems as though one the Manchester police force have noticed Share Savage, just savage (just also pretty funny) (Photo: PA Wire) Share Get Liverpool FC   Thank you for subscribing!   
When you're in poor form, there is nowhere to hide. Especially not on social media, and especially not when you're Liverpool Football Club . 
The Reds are getting it from all sides at the moment after a horror start to the year which has seen them drop out of the title race and exit two cup competitions, and everyone's having their say. 
Even the police. Jurgen's just been looking at the table (Photo: REUTERS) Liverpool's familiar 2017 look (Photo: Getty Images Europe) 
Because as spotted by our friends at the Manchester Evening News , Greater Manchester Police's Middleton branch were only too willing to pile on pain for Jurgen Klopp and his side via their official Twitter account on Wednesday. 
And maybe - just maybe - they might have been some Manchester United fans behind the keyboard. (Photo: Twitter / @GMPMIddleton) 
Referring to a new plan in place to punish drivers with six points on their licence if they're spotted on their phones, the force reminded everyone that Liverpool only picked up THREE over February - when they beat Tottenham but lost to Hull and Leicester. 
The Reds have actually only picked up six points in 2017 in total, but maybe GMP Middleton will wait to see how they get on against Arsenal at the weekend before going in on them again? 
Tweeting fingers at the ready... Like us on Facebook
